articles.title: Alibaba ditches plans to spin off cloud business and list supermarket - Financial Times
articles.description: Shares fall 10% after Chinese ecommerce giant says US export controls have created ‘uncertainties’ for its cloud business
articles.content:
Alibaba has ditched plans to spin off its cloud business and paused the listing of its supermarket unit amid waning investor enthusiasm for the Chinese ecommerce giants radical restructuring plan.

articles.title: BlackRock Files Application for Spot Ether ETF - CoinDesk
articles.description: The asset management giant last week registered the iShares Ethereum Trust, and via Nasdaq sought approval from the SEC for the new vehicle.
articles.content: BlackRock (BLK), the worlds largest asset manager, has filed an S-1 form with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) for its iShares Ethereum Trust, a spot ether exchange-traded fund (ETF)… [+1118 chars]

articles.title: MAS' Ravi Menon Calls Cryptocurrencies a Failure, Backs CBDCs and Stablecoins - CoinDesk
articles.description: Ravi Menon, the Managing Director of the Monetary Authority of Singapore, said crypto has performed poorly as a medium of exchange or store of value.
